turns.content: Generate a patient, pastel, modern color scheme in hex codes, 3 colors

Here's a patient, pastel, modern color scheme in hex codes, with three colors:

1. Light Peach: #FFD7BE
2. Soft Sage: #BCE3C5
3. Dusty Lavender: #C7B8EA

These colors have a calming effect and work well together to create a serene and modern color scheme.
